name: Danny Phantom in: The G.A.M.E Demo V. 0.1
name_original: Danny Phantom in: The G.A.M.E Demo V. 0.1
description:
This is the tech demo/beta version of Danny Phantom in: The G.A.M.E.

With 100% original art assets, I'm working on translating the entire Danny Phantom series into a fun, playable RPG!

NOTE: Any bonus characters found are aesthetic only, and will be for Demo use only (until I get to NG+ of course).
